section.p: This template represents the patient's physical function (e.g., mobility status, instrumental activities of daily living, self-care status) and problems that limit function (dyspnea, dysphagia). The template may include assessment scale observations, identify supporting caregivers, and provide information about non-medicinal supplies. This template is used to represent physical or developmental function of all patient populations.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-13889, CONF:1098-13890, CONF:1098-32568 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Functional Status Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-13908)/@code="54522-8" Functional status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31522, CONF:1098-31523)

contain zero or one [0..1] text
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
contains zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode
contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE"

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange such that it (CONF:1098-13937)
referenceRange could be used to represent normal or expected capability for the function being evaluated.
contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

contain [0..1] author such that it
Conforms to Author from CDA

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-13936)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-13892, CONF:1098-14596, CONF:1098-14218)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50:2014-06-09)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)
SHALL conform to Functional Status Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:13905, R2.0=CONF:1098-13905)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:13906, R2.0=CONF:1098-13906)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:13907, R2.0=CONF:1098-13907)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-13908)/@code="54522-8" Functional status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31522, CONF:1098-31523)

contain zero or one [0..1] text
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.0=CONF:1098-13929)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:13929, R2.0=CONF:1098-19101)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:13930, R2.0=CONF:1098-13930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:13932, R2.0=CONF:1098-13932)
contains zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode
contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE"

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:13895, R2.0=CONF:1098-13895, CONF:14597, R2.0=CONF:1098-14597, CONF:13897, R2.0=CONF:1098-13897)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14465, R2.0=CONF:1098-14465, CONF:14598, R2.0=CONF:1098-14598, CONF:14466, R2.0=CONF:1098-14466)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange such that it (CONF:1098-13937)
referenceRange could be used to represent normal or expected capability for the function being evaluated.
contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-13936)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-13892, CONF:1098-14596, CONF:1098-14218)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50:2014-06-09)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:13927)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:13928)
If value/@xsi:type=CD, SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14234, R2.0=CONF:1098-14234)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:13889, CONF:13890 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.67"
Consol Functional Status Result Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:13927)

Consol Functional Status Result Observation This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:13928)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation If value/@xsi:type=CD, SHOULD contain a code from SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14234, R2.0=CONF:1098-14234)
SHALL conform to Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:13905, R2.0=CONF:1098-13905)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:13906, R2.0=CONF:1098-13906)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:13907, R2.0=CONF:1098-13907)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:13908), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:13926)

Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.0=CONF:1098-13929)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:13929, R2.0=CONF:1098-19101)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:13930, R2.0=CONF:1098-13930)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:13932, R2.0=CONF:1098-13932)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (CONF:13933)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:13934)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:13935)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:13936) Conforms to Author from CDA

Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:13892, CONF:14596, CONF:14218) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:13895, R2.0=CONF:1098-13895, CONF:14597, R2.0=CONF:1098-14597, CONF:13897, R2.0=CONF:1098-13897) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

Consol Functional Status Result Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14465, R2.0=CONF:1098-14465, CONF:14598, R2.0=CONF:1098-14598, CONF:14466, R2.0=CONF:1098-14466) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
Consol Functional Status Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange, where its type is Reference Range (CONF:13937)
SHALL conform to CDA Reference Range
Consol Reference Range SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange, where its type is Observation Range (CONF:13938)
Consol Observation Range observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:13939)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation Range
